alert.note: Alert for Orange; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:28AM EDT until April 09 at 4:29AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Neversink River Above Bridgeville affecting Orange and Sullivan Counties. For the Neversink...including Godeffroy, Bridgeville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neversink River Above Bridgeville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood stage where minor flooding begins. The river begins to spread onto the parking lot at the Holiday Mountain Road ski shop. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by 8 AM, then crest at 14.0 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
